cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Enhancement Advisory: python-rtslib bug fix and enhancement update

full_product_name.product_name: python-rtslib-0:2.1.73-2.el8 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux BaseOS (v. 8)

reference.description: bz#1854723: CVE-2020-14019 python-rtslib: weak permissions for /etc/target/saveconfig.json

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note:
An update for python-rtslib is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux
8.

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat
Enterprise Linux 8.3 Release Notes linked from the References section.
